summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Division of Purchases; adding a new subchapter to Chapter 3.11 S.M.C. to establish in the Department of Contracting the Division of Purchases, define its authority and that of the City Purchasing Agent, provide for procurement by competitive bidding and specify exceptions to such requirement, establish a Committee on Purchasing Standards and specify its duties; and repealing Ordinance 102151, as amended, and Subchapter VIII of Chapter 3.14 S.M.C.
